paper_title: Temperature-dependent discovery of BCC refractory multi-principal element alloys: Integrating deep learning and CALPHAD calculations

claims.claim: Pearson correlation analysis across all 51 descriptors shows that the valence electron concentration (VEC) and Mulliken electronegativity are strongly positively correlated, with a Pearson correlation coefficient of r = 0.92
instruction: The notebook loads xlo_all.npy, computes the Pearson correlation matrix across all features, and visualizes the correlation heatmap
Verify that the cell corresponding to VEC and Mulliken electronegativity shows a strong positive correlation, with a Pearson correlation coefficient of r = 0.92 (red in the heatmap)
